name: part_009
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】紫咲シオン 5th Anniversary LIVE【#紫咲シオン5周年記念⁠】 [KdFYu1feK30]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Anata no Hana ga Akeru made' (Until Your Flower Dawns). Murasaki Shion sits on a crescent moon in a night sky setting.
scenes.song_name: Anata no Hana ga Akeru made

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Leica'. Murasaki Shion is in a bright daytime flower field.

subtitles.original: あなたの花が明けるまで
subtitles.english: Until Your Flower Dawns

subtitles.original: 壊れていたのは世界ではなくて
subtitles.english: It wasn't the world that was broken

subtitles.original: 間違っていたのはあなただけれど
subtitles.english: It was you who was wrong, but...

subtitles.original: 嘘で固められた世界でも
subtitles.english: Even in a world built on lies

subtitles.original: ごめんね あなたに生きててほしいの
subtitles.english: I'm sorry, I want you to live

subtitles.original: 時が戻ればなんて思いながら
subtitles.english: While thinking "if only time could turn back"

subtitles.original: 私はもう少しだけ諦めてる
subtitles.english: I've given up just a little bit more

subtitles.original: 声が枯れるまで歌い続けるのは
subtitles.english: Continuing to sing until my voice withers

subtitles.original: あなたのためだけじゃない
subtitles.english: Isn't just for your sake

subtitles.original: またいつか春の空を
subtitles.english: Let's walk under the spring sky

subtitles.original: 二人手をつないで歩きましょう
subtitles.english: Holding hands again someday

subtitles.original: 何も知らないあなたでいいの
subtitles.english: It's okay for you to know nothing

subtitles.original: 私はどこにも行かないから
subtitles.english: Because I'm not going anywhere

subtitles.original: Lily Lily 君の幸せなんて
subtitles.english: Lily, Lily, your happiness...

subtitles.original: 願ってたあの頃に戻れないんだ
subtitles.english: I can't return to those days when I wished for it

subtitles.original: 知ってるよ どうにもならないことも
subtitles.english: I know, even the things that can't be helped

subtitles.original: でも嫌いになんてなれなかったよ
subtitles.english: But I couldn't come to hate you

subtitles.original: またいつか光を歌いながら
subtitles.english: Let's walk holding hands again someday

subtitles.original: 二人手をつないで歩きましょう
subtitles.english: Singing of the light

subtitles.original: 明けない夜はないと教えてくれたこと
subtitles.english: That you taught me there's no night that doesn't end

subtitles.original: 私の手を引いてくれたこと
subtitles.english: That you took my hand

subtitles.original: あなたを忘れないよ
subtitles.english: I won't forget you

subtitles.original: Lily Lily 僕本当は君が好きだよ
subtitles.english: Lily, Lily, I really love you

subtitles.original: Lily Lily 君はどう？
subtitles.english: Lily, Lily, how about you?

subtitles.original: 私もあなたが好きよ
subtitles.english: I love you too

subtitles.original: ライカ
subtitles.english: Leica

subtitles.original: 一瞬で過ぎてった春も
subtitles.english: Spring that passed in an instant

subtitles.original: 夏も秋も美しくて
subtitles.english: Summer and autumn were beautiful too

subtitles.original: もうこんな僕はそのまま連れて行って
subtitles.english: Just take me away as I am

subtitles.original: 冬を待つ君の赤いマフラー
subtitles.english: Your red scarf waiting for winter

subtitles.original: 赤くなった頬が可愛くて
subtitles.english: Your reddened cheeks were cute

subtitles.original: ライカで写した君の顔を思い出した
subtitles.english: I remembered your face taken with the Leica

subtitles.original: I miss you このまま
subtitles.english: I miss you, if only I could

subtitles.original: いってしまえたらなんて
subtitles.english: Just go like this

subtitles.original: 最低な僕は歌う君に愛を
subtitles.english: The worst me sings love to you

subtitles.original: I love you このまま
subtitles.english: I love you, if only I could

subtitles.original: いってしまえたら僕は
subtitles.english: Just go like this

subtitles.original: 泣いていた君の涙さえ愛おしくて
subtitles.english: Even your tears as you cried are precious

subtitles.original: 舞い散るな
subtitles.english: Don't scatter

subtitles.original: 三秒前に泣き止んだ
subtitles.english: You stopped crying three seconds ago

subtitles.original: 君の長い髪が愛おしくて
subtitles.english: Your long hair is precious

subtitles.original: もう冬が終わる春が来る
subtitles.english: Winter is already ending, spring is coming
